title: S&P Downgrades Volkswagen And Its Subsidiaries By One Notch To A-minus
text:
Published By: Fox Business - Today 
Standard & Poor's on Monday downgraded Volkswagen AG's long-term rating by a single notch to A-minus from A and said it is keeping it on Cre...
